comments:
If I define a new category of extension org.eclipse.ui.commands and dont put any commands in that category I get the following null pointer exception.

Steps:
1. Launch IDE in Japanese OS (reproed on both Win32 and MacOSX)
2. Click on "Window" -> "Preferences"
3. In Preferences dailog, click on "Gerneral" -> "Keys"

Actual:
A pop-up warning saying ?Error occurs. Please check the error log for more
details.? If you look up the log file, you have an exception shown bottow

Expected:
No error.

Note:
Repro in Japanese-OS only.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 2 2006-10-07 06:20:35.393
!MESSAGE 繝励Λ繧ｰ繧､繝ｳ "org.eclipse.jface" 縺九ｉ縺ｮ繧ｳ繝ｼ繝峨?ｮ襍ｷ蜍輔〒蝠城｡
後′逋ｺ逕溘＠縺ｾ縺励◆縲?
